# Aim of the ggeffects-package

```{r}
library(ggeffects)
library(ggplot2)
library(parameters)

data(efc)
# make educational status categorical
efc$c172code <- as.factor(efc$c172code)
levels(efc$c172code) <- c("low", "mid", "hi")
# make gender categorical
efc$c161sex <- as.factor(efc$c161sex)
levels(efc$c161sex) <- c("male", "female")

model <- lm(barthtot ~ c12hour + neg_c_7 + c161sex + c172code, data = efc)
model_parameters(model)
```

```{r}
mydf <- ggpredict(model, terms = "c12hour")
mydf

theme_set(theme_bw())
ggplot(mydf, aes(x, predicted)) +
  geom_line()
```

```{r}
# automatic detection of numeric focal variable
# calculating p-value for linear trend 
hypothesis_test(model, "c12hour")
```
